data.name: Arran: The Book of Heroes
data.detailed_description:
Arran: The Book of Heroes is an action TopDown Hack & Slash cooperative multiplayer game, set in a fantasy world where mighty heroes rise and fight hordes of enemies to restore peace in a war ravaged land.



Up to 5 players online:
Play solo or with up to 4 online companions and fight your way through the dark forests and dungeons of Old Arran.
Take place in this epic quest as one of many heroes with their unique set of weapons and skills.
Earn rewards of gold, experience and legendary equipment to get your heroes ready for the final confrontation with the evil that menaces this land!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Arran is an epic co-op medieval adventure with a touch of RPG. Make your way through dungeons and enemies along with up to 5 online players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3.2120 cpu @3.30ghz (4 cpus)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic
